00090 MtrNode *
00091 Mtr_AllocNode(
00092    )
00093 {
00094     MtrNode *node;
00095 
00096     node = ALLOC(MtrNode,1);
00097     return node;
00098 
00099 } /* Mtr_AllocNode */
00100 
00101 
00113 void
00114 Mtr_DeallocNode(
00115   MtrNode * node /* node to be deallocated */)
00116 {
00117     FREE(node);
00118     return;
00119 
00120 } /* end of Mtr_DeallocNode */

00134 MtrNode *
00135 Mtr_InitTree(
00136    )
00137 {
00138     MtrNode *node;
00139 
00140     node = Mtr_AllocNode();
00141     if (node == NULL) return(NULL);
00142 
00143     node->parent = node->child = node->elder = node->younger = NULL;
00144     node->flags = 0;
00145 
00146     return(node);
00147 
00148 } /* end of Mtr_InitTree */
00149 
00150 
00162 void
00163 Mtr_FreeTree(
00164   MtrNode * node)
00165 {
00166     if (node == NULL) return;
00167     if (! MTR_TEST(node,MTR_TERMINAL)) Mtr_FreeTree(node->child);
00168     Mtr_FreeTree(node->younger);
00169     Mtr_DeallocNode(node);
00170     return;
00171 
00172 } /* end of Mtr_FreeTree */
00173 
00174 
00189 MtrNode *
00190 Mtr_CopyTree(
00191   MtrNode * node,
00192   int  expansion)
00193 {
00194     MtrNode *copy;
00195 
00196     if (node == NULL) return(NULL);
00197     if (expansion < 1) return(NULL);
00198     copy = Mtr_AllocNode();
00199     if (copy == NULL) return(NULL);
00200     copy->parent = copy->elder = copy->child = copy->younger = NULL;
00201     if (node->child != NULL) {
00202         copy->child = Mtr_CopyTree(node->child, expansion);
00203         if (copy->child == NULL) {
00204             Mtr_DeallocNode(copy);
00205             return(NULL);
00206         }
00207     }
00208     if (node->younger != NULL) {
00209         copy->younger = Mtr_CopyTree(node->younger, expansion);
00210         if (copy->younger == NULL) {
00211             Mtr_FreeTree(copy);
00212             return(NULL);
00213         }
00214     }
00215     copy->flags = node->flags;
00216     copy->low = node->low * expansion;
00217     copy->size = node->size * expansion;
00218     copy->index = node->index * expansion;
00219     if (copy->younger) copy->younger->elder = copy;
00220     if (copy->child) {
00221         MtrNode *auxnode = copy->child;
00222         while (auxnode != NULL) {
00223             auxnode->parent = copy;
00224             auxnode = auxnode->younger;
00225         }
00226     }
00227     return(copy);
00228     
00229 } /* end of Mtr_CopyTree */

00231 
00243 void
00244 Mtr_MakeFirstChild(
00245   MtrNode * parent,
00246   MtrNode * child)
00247 {
00248     child->parent = parent;
00249     child->younger = parent->child;
00250     child->elder = NULL;
00251     if (parent->child != NULL) {
00252 #ifdef MTR_DEBUG
00253         assert(parent->child->elder == NULL);
00254 #endif
00255         parent->child->elder = child;
00256     }
00257     parent->child = child;
00258     return;
00259 
00260 } /* end of Mtr_MakeFirstChild */
00261 
00262 
00274 void
00275 Mtr_MakeLastChild(
00276   MtrNode * parent,
00277   MtrNode * child)
00278 {
00279     MtrNode *node;
00280 
00281     child->younger = NULL;
00282 
00283     if (parent->child == NULL) {
00284         parent->child = child;
00285         child->elder = NULL;
00286     } else {
00287         for (node = parent->child;
00288              node->younger != NULL;
00289              node = node->younger);
00290         node->younger = child;
00291         child->elder = node;
00292     }
00293     child->parent = parent;
00294     return;
00295 
00296 } /* end of Mtr_MakeLastChild */
00297

00311 MtrNode *
00312 Mtr_CreateFirstChild(
00313   MtrNode * parent)
00314 {
00315     MtrNode *child;
00316 
00317     child = Mtr_AllocNode();
00318     if (child == NULL) return(NULL);
00319 
00320     child->child = child->younger = child-> elder = NULL;
00321     child->flags = 0;
00322     Mtr_MakeFirstChild(parent,child);
00323     return(child);
00324 
00325 } /* end of Mtr_CreateFirstChild */

00340 MtrNode *
00341 Mtr_CreateLastChild(
00342   MtrNode * parent)
00343 {
00344     MtrNode *child;
00345 
00346     child = Mtr_AllocNode();
00347     if (child == NULL) return(NULL);
00348 
00349     child->child = child->younger = child->elder = NULL;
00350     child->flags = 0;
00351     Mtr_MakeLastChild(parent,child);
00352     return(child);

00369 void
00370 Mtr_MakeNextSibling(
00371   MtrNode * first,
00372   MtrNode * second)
00373 {
00374     second->younger = first->younger;
00375     if (first->younger != NULL) {
00376         first->younger->elder = second;
00377     }
00378     second->parent = first->parent;
00379     first->younger = second;
00380     second->elder = first;
00381     return;
00382 
00383 } /* end of Mtr_MakeNextSibling */

00397 void
00398 Mtr_PrintTree(
00399   MtrNode * node)
00400 {
00401     if (node == NULL) return;
00402     (void) fprintf(stdout,
00403 #if SIZEOF_VOID_P == 8
00404     "N=0x%-8lx C=0x%-8lx Y=0x%-8lx E=0x%-8lx P=0x%-8lx F=%x L=%d S=%d\n",
00405     (unsigned long) node, (unsigned long) node->child,
00406     (unsigned long) node->younger, (unsigned long) node->elder,
00407     (unsigned long) node->parent, node->flags, node->low, node->size);
00408 #else
00409     "N=0x%-8x C=0x%-8x Y=0x%-8x E=0x%-8x P=0x%-8x F=%x L=%d S=%d\n",
00410     (unsigned) node, (unsigned) node->child,
00411     (unsigned) node->younger, (unsigned) node->elder,
00412     (unsigned) node->parent, node->flags, node->low, node->size);
00413 #endif
00414     if (!MTR_TEST(node,MTR_TERMINAL)) Mtr_PrintTree(node->child);
00415     Mtr_PrintTree(node->younger);
00416     return;
00417 
00418 } /* end of Mtr_PrintTree */
